seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Sr Data Engineer' and requires 5+ years of experience, aligning with senior level expectations.

job_family.evidence: Job title is 'Sr Data Engineer' and responsibilities focus on data pipelines, ETL, and cloud data platforms.

sub_specialty.evidence: Heavy emphasis on ETL workflows, data warehousing (Redshift, Synapse, BigQuery), and Airflow orchestration, indicating batch processing focus.

leadership_expectation.evidence: Explicitly mentions mentoring junior engineers and providing technical leadership without indicating direct reports or people management.

primary_cloud.evidence: Explicitly mentions AWS Redshift, Azure Synapse, and GCP BigQuery as core platforms, indicating multi-cloud environment.

secondary_clouds.evidence: All three major clouds (AWS, Azure, GCP) are mentioned as part of the data architecture, with no single primary cloud specified.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on ETL workflows, data warehousing, and Airflow orchestration strongly indicates batch processing as the primary paradigm.

orchestrator_category.evidence: Apache Airflow is explicitly listed as a required skill for workflow orchestration.

storage_layer.evidence: Primary storage systems mentioned are AWS Redshift, Azure Synapse, and GCP BigQuery â€” all data warehouse technologies.

remote_restriction.evidence: Explicitly states 'Onsite role - no remote work' and location is Denver, CO, indicating requirement to be physically present in that region.

timezone_focus.evidence: Geo restriction is US-only with specific state (CO) requirement, indicating focus on US time zones, particularly Mountain Time.

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite role in Denver, CO with no remote option implies relocation may be required for candidates not already in the area.

h1b_friendly.evidence: No mention of visa sponsorship in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction, suggesting H1B sponsorship is not offered.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support and requirement for 5+ years experience implies OPT/CPT candidates are not eligible.

citizenship_required.evidence: No explicit citizenship requirement, but onsite role in US implies authorization to work in the US is required.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position with comprehensive benefits (401k, ESPP, HSA, etc.) strongly suggests W2 employment.

benefits_level.evidence: Extensive benefits including medical, dental, vision, life, disability, pet, legal, 401k, ESPP, HSA, FSA, tuition reimbursement, PTO, and parental leave.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'promotional opportunities' and 'career development' but does not specify exact tracks or levels.

mentorship_signals.evidence: Explicitly states 'Mentor and guide junior data engineers' as an essential function.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: Mentions 'promotional opportunities' in the 'Why Join Bio-Techne' section.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring other roles within the company.

career_tracks_available.evidence: Mentions mentoring (IC track) and leadership skills (management track) as required, suggesting both paths are available.

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear must-have skills listed with no nice-to-have skills, indicating moderate strictness with no flexibility mentioned.

scope_definition.evidence: Focused on data engineering responsibilities with specific technologies and outcomes, not combining multiple roles.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills required (5+ years, cloud platforms, Spark, Airflow, Python, SQL) are reasonable for a senior data engineer role.
